char_XXXX_ABCDEF.desc: When attacking, deal 120% damage to target and attach an Afterimage. When the Afterimage is hit by Wis'adel's aftershocks, 15% chance to explode and deal 170% ATK as Physical damage to all nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>stunning</> for 1 seconds

On deployment, summon a Spirit's Shadow within Attack Range. When near a Spirit's Shadow, gain Camouflage 
Spirit's Shadow skill: Deal Arts damage to one enemy within Wis'adel's Attack Range, <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> it for {duration} seconds and attaching an Afterimage. Thereafter, gain {SP} SP
When attacking, {chance} chance to attack another random target within Attack Range, dealing {%ATK} ATK as Arts damage and <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> them for {duration} seconds
Attacks inflict -{RES} RES to target and increase their Arts damage taken by a {art.amp} for {duration} seconds

3 "Fine Dust" continually revolve around Civilight Eterna. When the "Fine Dust" hits an ally, it disappears and increases the Trait effect that ally by {trait}. Disappeared "Fine Dust" will reappear in {respawn} seconds
When deployed, reduce damage taken by all allies from [Sarkaz] enemies by {reduce}
During the first deployment, DP Cost -4. After retreat, the next Operator DP Cost -1
When deployed, increase all allies' Max HP by {HP%}. When skill is active, all allies recover {heal} Max HP every second

For {duration} seconds after deployment, PhonoR-0's attacks additionally deals <@ba.vup>{attack@ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> of ATK as <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>. Additionally, PhonoR-0 inflicts {Art.Fragile} <$ba.magicfragile>[Arts Fragility]</> and {EP.Fragile} <$ba.epfragile>[Elemental Fragility]</> to all enemies within Attack Range
